title: Discover Ionia | /dev diary - League of Legends

embed.description: Boogergames and WAAARGHbobo explore Ionia, a land saturated with magic and fractured by a Noxian invasion. Click here for more stories and art from the League Universe: universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/

replies.body: But how much time happened since the war?
Seven years since Swain seized power and commanded the Noxian armies to leave Ionia.

more like 24. she cut off swains arm at 14, but it wasn't until 3 years later that noxus left (and some time in between is when swain got his demon arm and planned his coup). its mentioned in irelia's new bio that she fought another 3 years after the placidium.

also worth knowing that she was probably even a little younger than 14 when she first learned to control the blades and joined the resistance against noxus

The main thing about Karma that has stayed consistent about her throughout the years and through her rework is that she is a character who strives for peace but wasn't going to lie down and hope it came one day.

She fought for it when she had to. She helped other people fight for peace.

Now there is literally zero of Karma left and now her lore is something that could have been added to a new champion or the like. There was very little reason to change her personality.

What about the Freljord?

I know it's not as in need of a lore update as Bandle City, but it still needs an update.

You can consider Lissandra's release as the Freljord event. In fact, it was the OG event. Never before had we had something like that save for maybe Skarner's release, along with the release of the Crystal Scar. Over time, it's gotten a few tweaks here and there, with the release of Braum, Ornn, etc.

Despite how long ago it was released, I think it's safe to say that the Freljord lore has stood up pretty well. The whole retcon was likely being planned during this event, and so, it was all written in a way to where it can stand alone from the IoW. If anything, all Riot may want to do is flesh it out even further, maybe color story explaining the War of the Three Sisters, and maybe how Ashe found her bow.

That said, Nunu is apparently next in line after Akali to get a VGU, so, we could see something for the Freljord come then.
